parameters.name: args
parameters.usage: Arguments to be passed to the dump command.

parameters.name: interimDataDir
parameters.usage: Directory where data will be stored temporarily before uploading to the backend.

parameters.name: enableCache
parameters.usage: Enable or disable caching. Disabling caching may impact backup performance.

parameters.name: scratchDir
parameters.usage: Directory for holding temporary files and restic cache.

volumeTemplate.name: kubestash-interim-volume
volumeTemplate.usage: Holds backed up data temporarily before uploading to the backend.

volumeTemplate.name: kubestash-tmp-volume
volumeTemplate.usage: Holds temporary files and restic cache.
